text: On 23 January 2016, the Democratic Left Alliance (SLD) held a leadership election, after the ex-President Leszek Miller resigned due to the election defeat in October 2015. Włodzimierz Czarzasty, who received 62.45%, was elected as the new President of the party. == Candidate == * Włodzimierz Czarzasty - former member of the National Council of Radio Broadcasting and Television * Jerzy Wenderlich - former member of Sejm == Result == {| class="wikitable" |- ! Candidate !! Votes |- | Włodzimierz Czarzasty || 428 (62.45%) |- | Jerzy Wenderlich || 305 (37.55%) |} == References == Category:Democratic Left Alliance Category:Leadership elections in Poland
title: 2016 Democratic Left Alliance leadership election
